Description: {{PageRef|Other|alt_name=General Change}}s
* Added a new hero, {{PageRef|Shiv}}
* Games can now be watched by an unlimited number of spectators
* Spectator games now have 1 minute delay
* Added localization for Simplified Chinese, Russian, Brazilian Portuguese, Spanish (Spain), Spanish (Latin America), Turkish, Ukrainian, Czech, and French. These are currently a work-in-progress.
* Language can be selected from the settings menu
* Matchmaking windows are now open 1 hour earlier in all regions
* You can now prioritize your roster into three groups to indicate your preference ordering to the matchmaker: Selected, Priority, High Priority
* Added customization options for your crosshair
* Builds: You can now author a suggested ordering of Ability Upgrades
* Builds: You can now add per-item author comments by right clicking on items while editing builds that will show up in the item tooltip for users of the build
* Fixed a bug that allowed published build data to overwrite local changes to a published build
* Fixed a bug that prevented the last used hero build from loading when it was not a favorited build
* Hovering items in the {{PageRef|Shop|alt_name=shop}} will now highlight their components, or which item they are components of
* Reworked the Hero Stats UI in the {{PageRef|Shop|alt_name=shop}}
* Hero Stats in the {{PageRef|Shop|alt_name=shop}} have been expanded and are now broken up by Weapon, Vitality, and Spirit. Various additional stats that were previously hidden have been added here.
* Individual stats can now be hovered over to see a breakdown of all the bonuses contributing to a value, including things like golden statues
* Added descriptive {{PageRef|Weapon|alt_name=gun}} information to each hero
* Added Spirit Power Impact panel that displays the effect of Spirit Power on your Abilities and Items
* Added Outgoing Damage as a UI display mode that you can toggle through
* Added a setting to let you customize the ability cancel hotkey (default is spacebar)
* Added a "Friends Only" checkbox to filter the watch tab
* Added an option to control zoom sensitivity
* Fixed Candle {{PageRef|Trooper}}s sometimes instantly disappearing on death rather than going into their death flash state
* Using an active item or ability removes the undo option for the item/AP
* Fixed some abuse cases with undoing AP cooldown reductions
* Added a video setting to reduce flashing effects
* Unpause hotkey is now displayed when the game is paused
* {{PageRef|Pause}} cooldown per player increased from 10 minutes to 15 minutes
* Improved visual clarity of {{PageRef|Grey Talon}}'s trap armed state
* Replaced the {{PageRef|Soul Urn|alt_name=Urn}} drop parachute with new effects
* Fixed some cases where the comeback {{PageRef|Souls|alt_name=souls}} would be higher than intended in the early game
* Fixed being unable to ping while dead
* Fixed {{PageRef|Bebop}}'s {{PageRef|Sticky Bomb}} sometimes misfiring
* Improved smoothing of spectator camera position and angles
* Fixed a bug that allowed teleporters to be used while carrying the {{PageRef|Soul Urn}}
* Fixed targeting previews that draw a model (like {{PageRef|McGinnis}}'s turrets) to update every frame, instead of being fixed at 60hz
* Fixed stuns resetting their duration if you were on the ground and became airborne
* Fixed some cases where {{PageRef|Lash}}'s {{PageRef|Ground Strike}} would cause your hero to be stuck
* Fixed Ricochet sometimes shooting the extra bullet from your {{PageRef|Weapon|alt_name=gun}} rather than the target
* Fixed {{PageRef|Arctic Beam}} T3 range not being calculated correctly when you have range increase items
* Fixed ESC not working to close Settings popup sometimes
* Various visual adjustments on highlight and strobe effects being too loud in some cases
* Holding M1 down while {{PageRef|Flame Dash}} ends will now cause you to fire your {{PageRef|Weapon|alt_name=gun}} instead of requiring you to let go and press again
* Added popup to bot games to indicate that they tend to be much longer games than normal ones
* Improved {{PageRef|Abrams}} Siphon and {{PageRef|Seismic Impact}} visuals to not obstruct player view as much
* Added new Silence status effect sound
* Updated bullet whizby sounds for nearly all characters
* Updated {{PageRef|Haze}} {{PageRef|Sleep Dagger}} cast, projectile loop and whizby
* Updated {{PageRef|Haze}} {{PageRef|Smoke Bomb}} sound
* Removed {{PageRef|Haze}} {{PageRef|Smoke Bomb}} voice line for everyone except the casting player and spectators
* Fixed some spectator/replay sound and music bugs
* Various sound related performance improvements
* More impactful damage indication sound for attackers
* Remastered {{PageRef|Abrams}}, {{PageRef|Pocket}}, and {{PageRef|Dynamo}} weapon fire sounds
* Improved lighting performance around {{PageRef|Shop|alt_name=shop}}
* Improved {{PageRef|Wraith}} tracers to feel more connected to their bullet
* Improved visibility of AOE around {{PageRef|Bebop}} while casting {{PageRef|Hyper Beam}}
* Improved effects around {{PageRef|Lady Geist}} {{PageRef|Soul Exchange}} to help with clarity
* Updated {{PageRef|Infernus}} tracer, muzzle, and impact fx revisions for better performance
* Fixed Mimic options in {{PageRef|Sandbox|alt_name=sandbox}} not working properly
* Added a sound for movement being restricted by Slowing Hex and {{PageRef|Vindicta}} tether
* Revised sounds for {{PageRef|Pocket}} {{PageRef|Flying Cloak}} duration and warp
* Clarified {{PageRef|Vindicta}} {{PageRef|Flight}} T1 tooltip
* Added alternate {{PageRef|Shop|alt_name=shop}} music
* Added Refresher cast sound
{{PageRef|Other|alt_name=Misc Gameplay}}
* Teleporter activation no longer gets canceled on incoming damage.
* Teleporter channel time increased from 4s to 5s
* {{PageRef|Walker}}s now require you to be within 30m to deal damage to them
* {{PageRef|Walker}} Health increased by 15%
* {{PageRef|Base Guardian}} Health increased by 20%
* {{PageRef|Patron}} damage increased by 30% after it is vulnerable
* Weakened {{PageRef|Patron}} Health increased by 15%
* Weakened {{PageRef|Patron}} now has a Torment {{PageRef|Pulse}} style effect, hitting up to 2 enemies in the {{PageRef|Pit|alt_name=pit}} for 75 damage per second
* You can now use {{PageRef|Melee|alt_name=melee}} hotkey while zoomed to exit zoom and perform a {{PageRef|Melee|alt_name=melee}}
* Added {{PageRef|Bounce Pad}}s in various areas of the map that launch you in a defined direction
bounce_pad_locations.jpg
* Added one-way defender exits beside each outer lane entrance
* Added Speed Boost Volumes in the defender passages on the outsides of the base
base_speed_boost.jpg
* Firehouse (building next to {{PageRef|Sapphire Hand|alt_name=Sapphire}} Yellow {{PageRef|Guardian}}) has been reworked to match the layout of the Chapel
* Low roof buildings beside {{PageRef|Amber Hand|alt_name=Amber}} Purple {{PageRef|Guardian}} and {{PageRef|Sapphire Hand|alt_name=Sapphire}} Yellow {{PageRef|Guardian}} are now valid play spaces
* Removed zap triggers
* Added truck on the back side of those buildings to allow climbing up
* Removed rooftop props for those buildings
* Added billboards to the edge closest to the lane
* Low roof buildings between inner lane {{PageRef|Walker}} arenas are now valid play spaces
* Removed zap triggers
* Expanded rooftop size
* Added fire escape stairs to allow access from the upper level from the Mid
rooftop_locations_large.jpg
* {{PageRef|Walker}} Arena - {{PageRef|Amber Hand|alt_name=Amber}} Yellow/{{PageRef|Sapphire Hand|alt_name=Sapphire}} Purple:
* Added catwalks from high ground defender area to building across the street
* Added passage through building and stairs up to a peek spot toward the {{PageRef|Guardian}}
* Replaced upper floor juke spot with a connection through building across from new peek spot
amber_yellow_walker_arena.jpg
* {{PageRef|Walker}} Arena - {{PageRef|Amber Hand|alt_name=Amber}} Orange/{{PageRef|Sapphire Hand|alt_name=Sapphire}} Blue:
* Added catwalk from the low roof building to the building across the street
* Replaced juke spot in the courtyard with passage connecting to the new catwalk
* Widened hallway above Underground {{PageRef|Shop}}
* Removed railing and added stairs in the passage toward the {{PageRef|Guardian}}
* Courtyard floor opening to the Underground {{PageRef|Shop}} moved closer to above the {{PageRef|Shop|alt_name=shop}}
* {{PageRef|Bounce Pad}} added to allow easier navigation from the Underground {{PageRef|Shop}} to the upper courtyard. Replaces a juke spot.
amber_orange_walker_arena.jpg
* {{PageRef|Walker}} Arena - {{PageRef|Amber Hand|alt_name=Amber}} Blue/{{PageRef|Sapphire Hand|alt_name=Sapphire}} Orange:
* Added interior shaft with {{PageRef|Bounce Pad}} to an upper level balcony from defender side to face the {{PageRef|Guardian}}
* Added a {{PageRef|Bounce Pad}} on the ground floor of the Police Station/Garment Building to the upper floor
* Added a juke spot inside the Police Station/Garment Building
* Added a juke spot down the stairs from the {{PageRef|Guardian}} to the left
amber_blue_walker_arena.jpg
* {{PageRef|Walker}} Arena - {{PageRef|Amber Hand|alt_name=Amber}} Purple/{{PageRef|Sapphire Hand|alt_name=Sapphire}} Yellow:
* Added an interior corridor through the building between the base and the {{PageRef|Walker}}
* Added a balcony that borders the arena on the back side of the {{PageRef|Walker}}
amber_purple_walker_arena.jpg
Weapon Items
* Headshot Booster: No longer has +40 Bonus Health
* Headshot Booster: Now has +40 Bullet Shield
* Monster Rounds: Health reduced from +65 to +50
* Monster Rounds: Now grants +30% Bullet Resistance vs NPCs
* Restorative Shot: Weapon Damage increased from 6% to 8%
* Active Reload: Lifesteal reduced from 40% to 30%
* Active Reload: Fire Rate reduced from 24% to 20%
* Kinetic Dash: HP regen increased from 1 to 1.5
* Long Range: Min distance reduced from 18m to 15m
* Mystic Shot: Cooldown increased from 5s to 6s
* Slowing Bullets: Now grants +5 Spirit
* {{PageRef|Souls|alt_name=Soul}} Shredder Bullets: Now grants +6% Weapon Damage
* {{PageRef|Souls|alt_name=Soul}} Shredder Bullets: Debuff duration increased from 5s to 6s
* Berserker: Fixed gaining stacks much faster than intended when taking damage from troopers
* Warp Stone: Active Bullet Resist reduced from +60% to +40%
* Warp Stone: No longer grants +2 Sprint
* Warp Stone: Now gains +8 Spirit
* Point Blank: No longer grants +300 Bullet Shield
* Point Blank: Now grants +15% Bullet Armor
* Escalating Resilience: Max Bullet Resist increased from 30% to 36%
* Heroic Aura: Lifesteal increased from 18% to 20%
* Alchemical Fire: Bullet Shield increased from 175 to 225
* Sharpshooter: Min distance reduced from 18m to 15m
* Titanic Magazine: Weapon Damage increased from 16% to 18%
* Titanic Magazine: Bullet Resist increased from 8% to 10%
* Intensifying Magazine: Time for Max Damage reduced from 3.5s to 3s (this is a buff)
* Ricochet: Fire Rate increased from +8% to +12%
* Ricochet: Health increased from +125 to +150
* Siphon Bullets: You permanently steal 1 stack (45 HP) from the enemy if they die under the debuff. If an enemy you stole a stack from kills you, they regain 1 stack back.
* Silencer: Reduced active duration from 6s to 4s
* Glass Cannon: Now gives +1 Movement Speed
* Glass Cannon: No longer gives +2 ammo on kill
* Glass Cannon: Weapon Damage reduced from +75% to +70%
* Glass Cannon: Now gives +10% Weapon Damage per kill (up to +50%)
* Glass Cannon: When you die you lose a stack
Vitality Items
* {{PageRef|Melee}} Lifesteal: Heal effectiveness vs non-heroes increased from 25% to 35%
* {{PageRef|Melee}} Lifesteal: Health increased from +70 to +75
* Extra Regen: Regen increased from 2.7 to 2.8
* Healing Rite: Cooldown reduced from 75s to 65s
* Healing Rite: Cast Range increased from 20m to 30m
* Healing Booster: Spirit Resist reduced from +7% to +6%
* Healing Booster: Bullet Resist reduced from +7% to +6%
* Divine Barrier: Duration increased from 4s to 5s
* Divine Barrier: Cooldown reduced from 30s to 28s
* Restorative Locket: Max Stacks reduced from 20 to 15
* Restorative Locket: Heal per stack increased from 30 to 40
* Health Nova: Health increased from +75 to +100
* Combat Barrier: Weapon Damage While Shielded increased from +24% to +28%
* Enchanter's Barrier: Spirit Power while Shielded increased from +17 to +20
* Bullet Lifesteal: Lifesteal increased from +26% to 28%
* Superior Stamina: Air Jump/Dash Distance reduced from +50% to +40%
* Superior Stamina: Fire Rate reduced from 10% to 7%
* Debuff Remover: Debuff resistance reduced from +40% to +35%
* Lifestrike: Heal effectiveness vs non-heroes increased from 25% to 35%
* Lifestrike: Heal increased from 45% of {{PageRef|Melee|alt_name=melee}} damage to +55%
* Majestic Leap: Health increased from +100 to +125
* Majestic Leap: Spirit Power increased from +8 to +10
* Metal Skin: Cooldown reduced from 30s to 25s
* Fortitude: Out of combat regen timer reduced from 13s to 12s
* Rescue Beam: Cooldown reduced from 30s to 25s
* {{PageRef|Souls|alt_name=Soul}} Rebirth: Rebirth Health increased from 40% to 50%
* {{PageRef|Souls|alt_name=Soul}} Rebirth: Cooldown reduced from 240s to 200s
* Inhibitor: Weapon Damage increased from 20% to 25%
* Colossus: Slow increased from 20% to 25%
* Colossus: Slow now affects stamina distances
* Phantom Strike: Cast range reduced from 35m to 30m
Spirit Items
* Infuser: No longer gives +7% Spirit Resist
* Infuser: Now gives +50 Health
* Spirit Strike: Spirit damage increased from 40 to 50
* Spirit Strike: Debuff increased from -10% Spirit Resist to -12%
* Mystic Reach: Now gives +5% Spirit Resist
* Ammo Scavenger: Spirit Power Duration increased from 24s to 35s
* Cold Front: Damage reduced from 100 to 75
* Cold Front: Damage Spirit Power scaling increased from 1.25 to 1.5
* Decay: Healing Reduction reduced from -70% to -50%
* Decay: Bleed increased from 2.8% to 3.1%
* Decay: Cooldown increased from 25s to 30s
* Slowing Hex: Debuff no longer cancels active mobility spells, it only prevents them from being casted
* Slowing Hex: Damage reduced from 100 to 70
* Slowing Hex: Cast range reduced from 35m to 25m
* Slowing Hex: Now also reduces stamina distance by 30%
* Slowing Hex: Projectile speed increased from 1200 to 1350
* Withering Whip: Now applies -40% Fire Rate instead of a Disarm
* Withering Whip: Duration increased from 3s to 4.5s
* Withering Whip: Cast range increased from 18m to 24m
* Quicksilver Reload: Infused ability bonus damage increased from +30 to +50
* Improved Cooldown: Cooldown reduction increased from 14% to 15%
* Ethereal Shift: No longer provides +10% Fire Rate
* Ethereal Shift: Cooldown increased from 25s to 30s
* Improved Burst: Reduced Weapon Damage from +12% to +8%
* Surge of Power: Movespeed duration increased from 5s to 6s
* Surge of Power: Imbued Spirit increased from +26 to +28
* Surge of Power: Now grants +75 Health
* Improved Reach: Now gives +10% Spirit Resist
* Superior Duration: Now provides +15% Weapon Damage
* Mystic Slow: Fire Rate reduction increased from -30% to -40%
* Silence Glyph: No longer reduces Spirit Resist
* Silence Glyph: Now deals +150 damage on impact
* Superior Cooldown: Non-Imbued ability cd reduction increased from 22% to 24%
* Escalating Exposure: Max Interval improved from 1s to 0.7s
* Diviner's Kevlar: Cooldown increased from 30s to 60s
* Refresher: Spirit Resist increased from 14% to 16%
* Curse: Cooldown increased from 40s to 50s
New Items
* Added a new T1 Weapon item. Grants +35% Bullet Projectile Speed, +14% Weapon Damage and +50 Bullet Shield.
Inspired by: https://forums.playdeadlock.com/threads/projectile-speed-increase-item.1539/

* Added a new T4 Spirit item, Magic Carpet: Active - After a 1.3s delay, a magic carpet arrives to pick you up. You gain full flight controls and have +6 m/s movement speed. Lasts 7 seconds. If you cast abilities or use your gun, the carpet disappears. While on the Magic Carpet you gain +400 Bullet and +400 Spirit Shields. Passively grants +150 Health, +10% Ability Duration, and +15 Spirit Power. Cooldown: 40s
Inspired by: https://forums.playdeadlock.com/threads/a-bunch-of-loose-item-ideas.11618/
Hero Gameplay
* {{PageRef|Abrams}}: Fixed {{PageRef|Seismic Impact}} often not dragging enemies in the air along with you when you are slamming down
* {{PageRef|Abrams}}: Fixed {{PageRef|Shoulder Charge}} not always placing enemies in front of you
* {{PageRef|Abrams}}: {{PageRef|Seismic Impact}} damage reduced from 175 to 150
* {{PageRef|Bebop}}: {{PageRef|Weapon|alt_name=Gun}} range reduced from 50m to 30m + 2.5m/boon (max of 58m)
* {{PageRef|Bebop}}: Speed while shooting increased from 55% to 70%
* {{PageRef|Bebop}}: Base regen increased from 2.5 to 3
* {{PageRef|Bebop}}: Base Bullet Resist increased from 0% to 10%
* {{PageRef|Bebop}}: Bullet Resist per boon reduced from 2.5% to 1.6% (same overall bullet resist at max)
* {{PageRef|Bebop}}: Hook range reduced from 40m to 35m
* {{PageRef|Bebop}}: Hook T2 increased from +25m to +30m
* {{PageRef|Bebop}}: {{PageRef|Exploding Uppercut}} now has a slight angle limitation to prevent straight-up direction
* {{PageRef|Bebop}}: {{PageRef|Exploding Uppercut}} radius increased from 10m to 14m
* {{PageRef|Bebop}}: {{PageRef|Exploding Uppercut}} T1 increased from -10s Cooldown to -11s
* {{PageRef|Bebop}}: Fixed hooking through {{PageRef|Cosmic Veil|alt_name=veil}}s sometimes not working
* {{PageRef|Bebop}}: {{PageRef|Sticky Bomb}} radius increased from 10m to 12m
* {{PageRef|Bebop}}: {{PageRef|Sticky Bomb}} can now be cast on self using alt cast hotkey
* {{PageRef|Bebop}}: {{PageRef|Hyper Beam}} T2 reduced from +140 to +100
* {{PageRef|Bebop}}: {{PageRef|Hyper Beam}} spirit scaling increased from 2.4 to 3.0
* {{PageRef|Bebop}}: {{PageRef|Hyper Beam}} turn rate improved by 10%
* {{PageRef|Bebop}}: {{PageRef|Hyper Beam}} nearby radius increased from 4.5m to 5m
* {{PageRef|Bebop}}: {{PageRef|Hyper Beam}} nearby damage now does 25% less than the full amount
* {{PageRef|Dynamo}}: {{PageRef|Rejuvenating Aurora}} can now be canceled by using stamina instead of needing to manually exit first (pre T3)
* {{PageRef|Dynamo}}: Fixed {{PageRef|Kinetic Pulse}} sometimes getting caught on stairs
* {{PageRef|Dynamo}}: {{PageRef|Singularity}} now has a 0.1s cast point
* {{PageRef|Dynamo}}: {{PageRef|Kinetic Pulse}} width increased from 4.5m to 5m
* {{PageRef|Dynamo}}: {{PageRef|Kinetic Pulse}} T3 increased from +115 Damage to +125
* {{PageRef|Grey Talon}}: {{PageRef|Charged Shot}} collision radius reduced by 10%
* {{PageRef|Grey Talon}}: Fixed T3 {{PageRef|Guided Owl}} not triggering correctly sometimes when the target has Spirit Armor

* {{PageRef|Haze}}: {{PageRef|Sleep Dagger}} now puts you in a brief drowsy state for 0.25s seconds where you move slowly before falling asleep (you still have the ability to shoot/cast/move/etc during this period)
* {{PageRef|Haze}}: {{PageRef|Fixation}} T2 from +6s Duration to +5s
* {{PageRef|Haze}}: {{PageRef|Fixation}} T3 reduced from +0.25 to +0.2
* {{PageRef|Haze}}: {{PageRef|Bullet Dance}} T1 increased from +6 to +7
* {{PageRef|Ivy}}: Fixed {{PageRef|Melee|alt_name=melee}} still going through when casting {{PageRef|Stone Form}} after initiating a {{PageRef|Melee|alt_name=melee}} attack
* {{PageRef|Ivy}}: {{PageRef|Stone Form}} T2 stun reduced from 0.75s to 0.5s
* {{PageRef|Ivy}}: {{PageRef|Watcher's Covenant}} T1 reduced from +15% Fire Rate to +10%

* {{PageRef|Ivy}}: Now has a new ultimate ability, {{PageRef|Air Drop}}. Take flight with an Ally (or self-cast to carry a bomb). You fly and drop the ally or bomb onto an area, dealing damage, slowing, and silencing enemies. {{PageRef|Ivy}} and the ally gain a bullet shield when they are dropped. Allies can drop by themselves at any time. When using the ability without an ally (carrying a bomb), it has a 1 second cast time.
* {{PageRef|Kelvin}}: {{PageRef|Arctic Beam}} no longer applies a Disarm
* {{PageRef|Kelvin}}: {{PageRef|Arctic Beam}} now slows Fire Rate (same values as slow)
* {{PageRef|Kelvin}}: {{PageRef|Arctic Beam}} max slow reduced from 90% to 60%
* {{PageRef|Kelvin}}: {{PageRef|Arctic Beam}} time to reach max slow increased from 1.2s to 2s
* {{PageRef|Kelvin}}: {{PageRef|Frozen Shelter}} can now be cast while using {{PageRef|Arctic Beam}}
* {{PageRef|Lash}}: Health per boon increased from 37 to 42
* {{PageRef|Lash}}: Base spirit resist increased from 8% to 15%
* {{PageRef|Lash}}: {{PageRef|Flog}} cooldown reduced from 30s to 25s
* {{PageRef|Lash}}: {{PageRef|Flog}} T3 now also reduces Fire Rate by 35%
* {{PageRef|McGinnis}}: Speed while shooting increased from 55% to 70%
* {{PageRef|McGinnis}}: {{PageRef|Mini Turret}}s now prioritize any heroes {{PageRef|McGinnis}} is shooting at
* {{PageRef|McGinnis}}: {{PageRef|Medicinal Specter}} duration Spirit Power scaling increased from 0.09 to 0.12
* {{PageRef|McGinnis}}: {{PageRef|Heavy Barrage}} T1 changed to Rockets apply 35% slow
* {{PageRef|Mo & Krill}}: {{PageRef|Scorn}} T3 now affects all damage types
* {{PageRef|Paradox}}: Base ammo reduced from 45 to 40
* {{PageRef|Paradox}}: {{PageRef|Kinetic Carbine}} projectile size reduced by 10%
* {{PageRef|Paradox}}: {{PageRef|Kinetic Carbine}} cooldown increased from 24s to 28s
* {{PageRef|Paradox}}: {{PageRef|Kinetic Carbine}} speed duration reduced from 4s to 3.5s
* {{PageRef|Paradox}}: {{PageRef|Kinetic Carbine}} no longer affects channels, cast times or things like {{PageRef|Lash}}'s {{PageRef|Death Slam}}
* {{PageRef|Paradox}}: {{PageRef|Kinetic Carbine}} T1 reduced from +0.75s Max Stop duration to +0.5s
* {{PageRef|Paradox}}: {{PageRef|Kinetic Carbine}} T2 cd reduction increased from -8s to -10s
* {{PageRef|Paradox}}: {{PageRef|Time Wall}} T3 silence duration reduced from 3.5s to 3s
* {{PageRef|Paradox}}: {{PageRef|{{PageRef|Paradox}}ical Swap}} projectile size reduced by 10%
* {{PageRef|Pocket}}: {{PageRef|Barrage}} now respects line of sight
* {{PageRef|Pocket}}: {{PageRef|Barrage}} amp effect now shows on {{PageRef|Pocket}}
* {{PageRef|Pocket}}: Base Bullet Resist increased from -15% to 0%
* {{PageRef|Pocket}}: Base Spirit Resist reduced from 0% to -15%
* {{PageRef|Pocket}}: {{PageRef|Barrage}} Amp per stack reduced from 10% to 8%
* {{PageRef|Pocket}}: {{PageRef|Barrage}} T3 changed to +5% Amp Per Stack
* {{PageRef|Pocket}}: Fixed the camera moving too slowly after teleporting with Cloak
* {{PageRef|Seven}}: Fixed multiple instances of {{PageRef|Static Charge}} not working correctly
* {{PageRef|Seven}}: {{PageRef|Lightning Ball}} duration increased from 4s to 5s
* {{PageRef|Seven}}: {{PageRef|Static Charge}} stun delay reduced from 4s to 3.5s
* {{PageRef|Vindicta}}: {{PageRef|Stake}} base duration reduced from 2.5s to 2.25s
* {{PageRef|Vindicta}}: {{PageRef|Stake}} T1 duration reduced from 1s to 0.75s
* {{PageRef|Viscous}}: Fixed {{PageRef|Splatter}} direct hits counting as the second hit
* {{PageRef|Viscous}}: Fix Damage prevention after being hit by {{PageRef|Viscous}}' {{PageRef|Goo Ball}} being reduced by Debuff Reducer
* {{PageRef|Viscous}}: {{PageRef|The Cube}} cast range increased from 25m to 30m
* {{PageRef|Viscous}}: {{PageRef|The Cube}} T2 cooldown reduced from -25s to -22s
* {{PageRef|Viscous}}: {{PageRef|Puddle Punch}} now deals {{PageRef|Light Melee|alt_name=light {{PageRef|Melee|alt_name=melee}}}} damage and is affected by {{PageRef|Melee|alt_name=melee}} items
* {{PageRef|Viscous}}: {{PageRef|Puddle Punch}} Charge Delay increased from 0.5s to 1.5s
* {{PageRef|Viscous}}: {{PageRef|Goo Ball}} duration reduced from 12s to 10s
* {{PageRef|Viscous}}: {{PageRef|Goo Ball}} T1 duration reduced from +6s to +5s
* {{PageRef|Viscous}}: {{PageRef|Goo Ball}} cooldown increased from 80s to 90s
* {{PageRef|Viscous}}: {{PageRef|Goo Ball}} now deals 50% damage to bosses
* {{PageRef|Viscous}}: {{PageRef|Goo Ball}} spirit resist reduced from 80% to 70%
* {{PageRef|Viscous}}: {{PageRef|Goo Ball}} bullet resist reduced from 70% to 60%
* {{PageRef|Viscous}}: {{PageRef|Goo Ball}} can now only stun and damage a target once every 1.5s, up from once every 1.0s
* {{PageRef|Viscous}}: {{PageRef|Goo Ball}} acceleration lowered a bit
* {{PageRef|Viscous}}: Stunning or immobilizing {{PageRef|Viscous}} now stops the ball from moving, and prevents him from doing damage and stunning
* {{PageRef|Warden}}: {{PageRef|Binding Word}} no longer drains 1 stamina
* {{PageRef|Warden}}: {{PageRef|Alchemical Flask}} cooldown reduced from 16s to 13s
* {{PageRef|Warden}}: {{PageRef|Alchemical Flask}} T2 changed from -10s Cooldown to Drains 1 Stamina
* {{PageRef|Warden}}: {{PageRef|Alchemical Flask}} T3 now also reduces cooldown by -7s
* {{PageRef|Warden}}: {{PageRef|Binding Word}} immobilize duration reduced from 2s to 1.75
* {{PageRef|Warden}}: {{PageRef|Binding Word}} now has a quick cast behavior (same as {{PageRef|Static Charge}})
* {{PageRef|Wraith}}: {{PageRef|Card Trick}} now has 0.5s cd per cast
* {{PageRef|Wraith}}: {{PageRef|Telekinesis}} T2 duration reduced from +0.75s to +0.5s
* {{PageRef|Wraith}}: {{PageRef|Full Auto}} T2 changed to Imbues Bullets with +5 Spirit Damage (only affects {{PageRef|Wraith}})
* {{PageRef|Wraith}}: Fixed being able to {{PageRef|Melee|alt_name=melee}} and {{PageRef|Parry|alt_name=parry}} while stunned by {{PageRef|Wraith}}'s {{PageRef|Telekinesis}}
* {{PageRef|Yamato}}: Base {{PageRef|Melee|alt_name=melee}} damage increased by 10%
* {{PageRef|Yamato}}: {{PageRef|Flying Strike}} T3 now procs after the ability ends, rather than when connecting to the target
